title: Sr Hardware Engineer
full_description: Job descriptionIntrepid Control Systems (www.intrepidcs.com) is looking for a full-time Sr. hardware development engineer to work with our core research and development team in our USA office.Requirements:Minimum of 5 years experience in PCB design and layout in high volume production environments.Ability to read, understand and implement complicated requirements from large and small automotive OEMs.Experience with multi-gig designes with 10 layer PCBs or more.Investigate new technologies, frameworks and help with architecture, design and implementation of product enhancements.Automotive electrical design experience (Connectors, power isolation, sensors and actuators, thermal requirements, EMC, design safety requirements).Ability to be the point of contact for communication with multiple customersBenefits:Private office with a door401(k)Dental insuranceFlexible scheduleHealth insurancePaid time offVision insurance
